name: Blacktrace
description:
Blacktrace is a third person shooter set in a film noir, low poly world. You play as John Black, a private investigator turned rogue. He's set out to kill every criminal that crosses his path. You work from case to case unlocking different types of weapons.

Features
  • Climbing
  • Ragdoll Physics
  • Dismemberment
  • 9 Weapon/Item Types
  • 4 Different Levels
  • Destructible Environment
  • Enemy AI
Early Access

Blacktrace is still in development. Beware there are still bugs and placeholder objects in the game. Thank you for your support!
